pluginstrument.author: Nans Plancher
pluginstrument.description:
Lxnav S10x implementation for discus 2c
Features implemented : - Vario speed in a +/-5 m/s range. Needle in medium size - Avg wind direction and speed in knots - Avg vario on a period of 20s - Altitude in ft
Github repository : https://github.com/nan0/air-manager-instrument_lxnax-s8x
